description: New York City school level College Board AP results for 2010. Records with 5 or fewer students are suppressed. Students are linked to schools by identifying which school they attend when registering for a College Board exam. A student is only included in a school’s report if he/she self-reports being enrolled at that school. Data collected and processed by the College Board.

name: AP (College Board) 2010 School Level Results
